home.title: PSY-DIVER
home.subtitle: Gender and Diversity-Related Factors in Psychiatric-Psychotherapeutic Hospital Care
home.description: A groundbreaking research initiative examining how gender, origin, social circumstances, and living situations influence psychiatric treatment patterns, effectiveness, and outcomes.

goals.title: Research Goals
goals.description: Examining how psychiatric patients can receive more individualized and gender-equitable treatment through intersectional analysis.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: Mixed-methods approach combining large-scale data analysis, AI extraction, qualitative interviews, and stakeholder engagement.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Analysis of approximately 50,000 annual inpatient cases and 170,000 outpatient cases from psychiatric hospital networks.

impact.title: Expected Impact
impact.description: Evidence-based recommendations to improve psychiatric care equity and effectiveness for all patients.

medication.title: Medication Differences
medication.description: Analyzing prescribing patterns across gender, origin, and social circumstances to identify disparities and optimize treatment approaches.

therapeutic.title: Therapeutic Approaches
therapeutic.description: Examining how different demographic variables influence the selection and delivery of psychotherapeutic interventions.

outcomes.title: Treatment Outcomes
outcomes.description: Measuring effectiveness across diverse patient populations to ensure equitable care delivery and positive outcomes.

intersectional.title: Intersectional Factors
intersectional.description: Understanding how gender, origin, housing status, and living situations interact to affect illness patterns and treatment responses.

cta.title: Interested in Learning More?
cta.description: Discover detailed information about our research methodology, partners, and how we're working to improve psychiatric care for all.

footer.description: Gender and diversity-related factors in psychiatric-psychotherapeutic hospital care
